title: Wicked Things
description: A boy and a girl met one night and fell in love. One was broken and delicate. The other was callous and violent. They hid their true selves from each other until it was no longer possible. They both know that people are cruel. They see whatâ€™s on the outside and never care to look past the surface. Secrets are kept close within, and while some are never shared, others come to light bringing to bear the starkest truths. And this? This is the story of how the delicate girl and the violent boy began their love affair.
author: Yolanda Olson
